title: cmd/godoc: Position using fragment identifiers for constants and variables.
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. http://golang.org/pkg/unicode/#IsPrint
2. http://golang.org/pkg/unicode/#MaxRune
3. http://golang.org/pkg/unicode/#PrintRanges

What is the expected output?
All three examples should update the position based on the fragment identifier.

What do you see instead?
Only the example 1 does so.

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +123d0cef66f8 Thu May 02 13:02:00 2013 +1000 linux/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.
All three examples works as expected on http://godoc.org.

1. http://godoc.org/unicode#IsPrint
2. http://godoc.org/unicode#MaxRune
3. http://godoc.org/unicode#PrintRanges
